fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm status.sh reports upgrades in progress
fields.request_details:
1. Start an upgrade on a system install (for example `./upgrade.sh --no-restart`) and keep the process running.
2. While the upgrade is running, check `locks/upgrade_in_progress.lck` and confirm the timestamp updates when the upgrade starts.
3. Run `./status.sh` during the upgrade and verify it prints `Upgrade status: in progress` along with the start time from the lock file.
4. Let the upgrade finish and confirm `locks/upgrade_in_progress.lck` is removed automatically and `./status.sh` reports `Upgrade status: idle`.
5. Document any discrepancies in the release notes.
